channel.title: Project insanity[specific items dont drop on death]
channel.description: so i got project insanity by marcbob and the chaotics and claws dont drop on death how can i make it to were they do drop on death???

item.title: Project insanity[specific items dont drop on death]
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

well i looked and src>server>world. were do i go from that there is a couple of files and a folder. maybe you could help me by msn?? cjdean1243@hotmail.com
cause i looked in a couple files and couldnt really figure it out.

Read full topic
item.source: Project insanity[specific items dont drop on death]

item.title: Project insanity[specific items dont drop on death]
item.dc:creator: @Blyth1 Blyth1
item.description:
@Blyth1 wrote:

yea its very simple adding lunar and ancient altars

go to objectmanager
located - src:server:world

you will see codes like this

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(6163, 3083, 3488, 1, 10);

that is how you add objects to the game

here is lunar for you

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(410, 3083, 3488, 1, 10);
remember to change 3083 and 3488
to were you want the lunar located

hope i helped you
if you need anything else just say

Read full topic

@deans1243 wrote:

i deleted all the items in that and it just made it to were i can drop a item on the ground. but when in pking the claws and chaotics still dissapear:( kk do you know lunar and ancients altar codes? or know were i might be able to fiond it

Read full topic
item.source: Project insanity[specific items dont drop on death]

item.title: Project insanity[specific items dont drop on death]
item.dc:creator: @EmulousGuru EmulousGuru
item.description:
@EmulousGuru wrote:

The UNDROPPABLE_ITEMS array only appends to the dropItem packet.
This makes all items in the array, delete upon drop. So, you, nor anyone else, will be able to pick the item up.

@deans; you can spawn an altar, or you can make a command, a button, an npc, or anything else change the magic book for you.

Read full topic
